title: Google Pixel only charges in hard reboot menu
content:
My Google Pixel 3 XL has a charging issue. It will not charge UNLESS it is plugged in while on the "hard reboot menu", which is accessed by holding the power+volume down buttons for ~20 seconds. If it is turned fully off and plugged in, it shows the "charging battery" symbol for 1 second, flashes the battery percentage for 1 second, and then repeats the process without charging.

Has anyone else experienced this problem?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
